turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, will you place an order for me with Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Fifth st please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Java Chip please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I have that ordered for you. I've charged your account on file

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great thanks, do you know when it will be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should be ready in just a couple minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, I am sending confirmation to your mobile now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're the best

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can do for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was the Starbucks on Fifth, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure was

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, then that's it, thanks again, bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, bye!
